newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: VA Tech units win China hydro power deal.
newsitem.headline: VA Tech units win China hydro power deal.

text.p: Two units of blue-chip engineering group VA Technologie AG, Elin Energieversorgung and Voest-Alpine MCE, have received weighty contracts for a Chinese hydroelectric power plant, the group said on Tuesday.
Elin will provide electrical equipment and VA MCE four bulb turbines for the Da Yuan Du plant in Hunan province. The contract is worth around 360 million schillings.
The plant is intended to meet the rapidly growing energy needs of the province, providing 130 megawatts of power.
